title: Product Catalog Recommendation
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create a new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the recommendation support of the Product Catalog
Is a crucial capability in the sales process,
that provides customer-specific recommendations. To do this, the catalog uses a recommendation engine that, for example, knows frequently ordered products, the customer's likes and dislikes, or knows the customer's product inventory. In order to find the best product recommendations in the catalog, various sources (Product catalog, Inventory, Campaigns, IXUS,...) are used and combined. If there are several recommendations, they are presented in a defined order.
Unlike todays solution like BSP or CARMEN
our solution recognizes and recommends the products that best suit the customer's needs at that moment (next best offer).
